title: Siofra's Fight
description: Her nerves and emotions have gotten the best of telepathic Siofra, forcing her to stay away from her Montana home where her husband and sons are waiting for her. When the Master Vampire of Las Vegas makes it known that he wants her for his own, her new found mate, Abe, and some new fang-bearing friends have to take her home. Conall loves her no matter what and with Dyson, they will see her through anything. When their family comes under direct danger from the Master Vampire, can Siofra embrace her magic to put an end to the psychopathic blood sucker?Magical beings gather in Book 4 with a special preview for Book 5
author: Theresa Marguerite Hewitt
